page.title: 10The Blacksmith at Balmullo
page.content: One of the most famous residents is Mr. David Wilson, the village blacksmith. He has been well-known as a very talented blacksmith for many years, but this year accomplished a remarkable achievement and won the world championship for blacksmiths in Calgary, Canada. The competition took place over several days and included such events as making special horse-shoes to correct hoof disorders, and shoeing horses. Mr. Wilson has a great number of medals, trophies, certificates and other awards which he has won during the past thirty-five years. He has now decided to retire from competition and his son, who is also called David, will carry on the family tradition. Perhaps he will be the World Champion one day, too!
